data.name: Conqueror's Blade - Helheim - Battle Pass
data.detailed_description:
A new saga begins in Conqueror’s Blade: Helheim! Upgrade your Battle Pass for access to over 100 Tiers of exclusive rewards, including:
  • Hero Attire: Instantly unlock Loptr's Hide Hero Attire when you activate your Battle Pass, and master your fate to claim the Bringer of Thunder Hero Attire at Tier 100.
  • Unit and Mount Attire: Recruit fearsome fighters from the Northlands and equip them with the Einherjar Unit Attire. Ride into battle alongside them atop a steed clad in the Horned Gulltoppr Mount Set!
  • All-New Weapon Skins: Collect Blades throughout the Season and redeem them in the Seasonal Store for godly weapon skins.
  • Revamped Cosmetics: Redeem Blades for exclusive cosmetics, including antique variants of Attire previously only available in Season VII: Wolves of Ragnarok.
  • Emotes: Collect new Emotes and express yourself in victory, defeat, and everything in between.

Conqueror’s Blade: Helheim is now available as a free update. Get your Battle Pass, complete new Seasonal Challenges, and start earning awesome rewards today!

IMPORTANT: Do not buy the Battle Pass for Conqueror’s Blade: Helheim if you have already purchased it in-game.

HOW TO ACTIVATE YOUR BATTLE PASS
To transfer your Battle Pass in-game, go to your web Inventory, sign in with your Conqueror’s Blade account, and assign your item(s) to your chosen character.
data.about_the_game:
A new saga begins in Conqueror’s Blade: Helheim! Upgrade your Battle Pass for access to over 100 Tiers of exclusive rewards, including:
  • Hero Attire: Instantly unlock Loptr's Hide Hero Attire when you activate your Battle Pass, and master your fate to claim the Bringer of Thunder Hero Attire at Tier 100.
  • Unit and Mount Attire: Recruit fearsome fighters from the Northlands and equip them with the Einherjar Unit Attire. Ride into battle alongside them atop a steed clad in the Horned Gulltoppr Mount Set!
  • All-New Weapon Skins: Collect Blades throughout the Season and redeem them in the Seasonal Store for godly weapon skins.
  • Revamped Cosmetics: Redeem Blades for exclusive cosmetics, including antique variants of Attire previously only available in Season VII: Wolves of Ragnarok.
  • Emotes: Collect new Emotes and express yourself in victory, defeat, and everything in between.

Conqueror’s Blade: Helheim is now available as a free update. Get your Battle Pass, complete new Seasonal Challenges, and start earning awesome rewards today!

IMPORTANT: Do not buy the Battle Pass for Conqueror’s Blade: Helheim if you have already purchased it in-game.

HOW TO ACTIVATE YOUR BATTLE PASS
To transfer your Battle Pass in-game, go to your web Inventory, sign in with your Conqueror’s Blade account, and assign your item(s) to your chosen character.
data.short_description: Play Conqueror’s Blade: Helheim to unlock 100+ levels of exclusive rewards, including legendary Hero Attire, Emotes, weapon skins, and more!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 2GB / AMD HD 5870 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / AMD R9 380 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
